sentences.english: Yiwu Rui Song Paper Co. , Ltd. is the successor KOLIN enterprises.

sentences.english: The forefather is Yiwu city biyang crystal artwork factory .

sentences.english: These days, the mood in Yiwu is depressed.

sentences.english: It is one of the biggests belt manufacturer of Yiwu.

sentences.english: Don't worry. You will be used to Yiwu soon.

sentences.english: In Yiwu, Zhejiang, and even appeared in the local university campus to open shop.
sentences.chinese: 在浙江義烏，甚至還出現了全校開網店的地方高校。

sentences.english: You never know who you are going to bump into in Yiwu.
sentences.chinese: 在義烏，你永遠不會知道將會遇到誰。

sentences.english: But most of Yiwu's Middle Easterners have only a rudimentary grasp of Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 但是在義烏的大多數中東人對普通話卻知之不多。

sentences.english: Workers in Yiwu set out to make Christmas products early in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 義烏的工人們從今年夏天就開始製作聖誕節商品了。

sentences.english: In recent years, the volume of export goods managed by production enterprises makes up a large proportion of Yiwu's total export.
sentences.chinese: 這幾年，紡織品自營出口額佔義烏市出口比重較大。

sentences.english: How traffic from Nanjing in Nanjing Vocational College of Yiwu market?

sentences.english: If which day I arrived in Yiwu and I dare such a love?
sentences.chinese: 假如我哪一天到義烏敢不敢和我這樣的來一場戀愛？

sentences.english: A year ago, Yiwu was a showcase for a booming China.
sentences.chinese: 一年前，義烏市是蓬勃發展的中國的一個窗口。

sentences.english: Cultures and products from 28 countries are on display in China Yiwu Stationery&Arts Trade Fair.
sentences.chinese: 來自28個國家的文化和產品在義烏文博會亮相了。

sentences.english: And It takes 1 hour by car from Yiwu to Our Factory.
sentences.chinese: 它需要1小時，開車從義烏到我們的工廠。
